overview: We are looking for a detail-oriented Business Analyst to join our growing team and help drive business solutions.
required_skills: Business Analysis, Data Analysis, Requirements Gathering, Stakeholder Management, Process Mapping, Documentation, SQL, Microsoft Excel, Reporting Tools
experience: 0-2 years of experience in business analysis or related fields.
good_to_have: Experience with Agile methodologies, familiarity with data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau, Power BI), and understanding of business operations in tech industries.
